Nightlight:

Nightlight gasped in terror


From: Preston Carroll 
Sent: Tue=
sday, April 13, 2010 11:32 AM
To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
Subject: Re: Blac=
kFortress


  
Who: SCOURGE, SCORPONOK, Hydras, Darkhawk, Perceptor, Nights=
hift,
Tuscon Prime, Kup, Rodimus, Nightlight
Location: Black Fortress - Thr=
one Room

Scourge, who had never been affected by the disruptor wave from
T=
uscon, quite probrably because he is of minion design rather then
just dece=
pticon, just watched, unsure of what to do. His optics blazed
with represse=
d anger as he looked from Hydras to Tuscon and back, his
finger quivering o=
n the trigger of his weapon.

Scorponok on the other hand, after having bee=
n brushed aside so
casually by Tuscon, now stood with his weapons oriented =
at the Autobot
leader, ready to fire his own barrage of weapons.

However w=
hat is of more concern is the internal weaponry, the wall
mounted cannons t=
hat oriented, not just on Tuscon but also the other
maximals and Autobots i=
n the room.

A voice came over the loud speakers could be heard, however to=
 the
surprise of many it was not Cyclonus' but one that was somehow deeper
=
and yet colder at the same time, it was Jhiaxus. "It would appear
Tuscon Pr=
ime that your assessment of the situation is not as it would
seem."

"Enter=
ing this base without preperation, and leading your back up in
here without=
 assesing the true odds against you was a tactical flaw on
your part." The =
voice continued coldly.

"If you do anything other than follow the very spe=
cific orders of our
leader Hydras, I will have the entire arsonal of this f=
acility open
fire on you." The energy cannons that were in the room began t=
o glow
as they prepared for action, "You will comply."

Unfortunately it wa=
s at this point that Rodimus showed up with
Nightlight, "AH SLAG" Rodimus s=
aid as he took in the situation . . .

(TAG)

Preston
